metadata.title: Personalization & User Profiles
metadata.description: Spec for personalization, user profiles, preferences, memory/context, privacy controls, and agent tasks.

overview: The system must support user profiles, preferences, memory/context, privacy controls, notifications, and activity feeds.
requirements: Implement user profile and preference management.
Build privacy and access control features.
Design and implement timeline, gallery, and conversation UIs.

postgres.usage: Store user data, preferences, and activity.

agent_tasks: Implement user profile and preference endpoints.
Build privacy and access control UI.
Design and implement timeline, gallery, and conversation UIs.
Write tests for all personalization features.
